title: Civilian wages fall, more volunteer soldiers

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to increase the supply of soldiers for an all-volunteer army?

choices.label: A decrease in the salaries paid to soldiers
A decrease in the average wage rate in civilian employment
A reduction in college tuition benefits provided by soldiers
The imposition of new restrictions on women in the military
An increase in the required length of service

content.answer: A decrease in the average wage rate in civilian employment

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
